short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the boring stuff by sending personalized connection requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to help users send personalized connection requests to potential connections on LinkedIn. Simply click the extension after you've searched for who you want to request and let the extension do the work for you. This extension will free up valuable time that could otherwise be spent on other tasks. 

To use, click on the extension - select to use when clicking on extension - go to LinkedIn page with potential connections, and click extension.
